meanings.definition: A member of a nomadic Arab people of the desert.
meanings.sent1: The beduins traveled across the desert with their camels.
meanings.sent2: Many beduins live a traditional nomadic lifestyle in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The beduins decided to have a desert picnic under the starry sky.
meanings.sent4: The beduins were like shadows in the vast desert, moving silently.
meanings.sent5: The image of the beduins riding through the dunes stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A nomadic Arab of the desert.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of beduins setting up camp near an oasis.
meanings.sent2: The beduins knew how to navigate the harsh desert terrain.
meanings.sent3: The beduins had a sandcastle-building competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The beduins' tents looked like colorful flowers in the sandy desert.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed among the beduins as they shared stories.
